name: Ivan "Ironman" Stewart's Super Off Road
description:
Strap on your helmet for some rough and tumble racing excitement with Ivan "Ironman" Stewart's SUPER OFF-ROAD(tm). Race up to 4 players at the same time in the game that's just like real dirt racing.

And like the #1 arcade game, this mega-hit for your Nintendo Entertainment System is filled with mud holes, jumps and other action moves. 8 different stadium tracks and a total of 16 configurations let you play dirty for a long time, too. So get Super Off-Road and hit the dirt flying!"
